item.title: My robot side project
item.description: About a year-and-a-half in my latest profession, I started to think how should I am able to justify myself fto be a robotic professional capable of understanding, designing, and developing complex projects involving integrating autonomous navigation technology into modern day’s robots. Please also be aware that we are stepping into an ae of rapid and ever-evolving age of generative AI in which people are constantly proposing extremely revolutionizing concepts and tools to aid in different tasks in such a magnitude that is not previously expected.
